item.title: Machine Learning in R Tutorial
item.description: Introduction Machine learning is the process of building predictive models. At the core of machine learning is building models which offer predictive power and can be used to understand data we have yet to collect. In scientific practice, we have all used machine learning before when we run regression models! However, machine learning is a complex topic with a wide range of possiblities and applications. We encounter applications for machine learning each day.
